a_particularly_particular_author.description: Katheryne seems to have a new commission for you.This commission involves traveling to Tsurumi Island, which is shrouded in perpetual fog, to help Sumida gather material for her novel and find the Maushiro. According to Sumida, there is someone on Ritou who can take you all to Tsurumi Island.Using Kama's boat, you arrive at the mysterious, fog-shrouded island to help Sumida put her novel together. Next up, you need to go deeper into the land and retrieve this so-called Maushiro.According to Sumida, Tsurumi Island's civilization should have ceased to be for millennia now... But somehow, there are still people alive here.You met a young man named Ruu rather out of blue and made offering to the perch in a somewhat haphazard manner. According to him, Tsurumi Island must conduct a certain ceremony, and the ceremonial site is a place where Maushiro will gather. It is time to head to the site and speak with the priest responsible for the ceremony.The Tsurumi locals are behaving a little oddly, but you take their commission to make offering at three perches nonetheless. As long as the ceremony goes smoothly, you should be able to get your hands on the Maushiro and complete Sumida's commission.You completed the three offerings to the perch and spoke to Ruu, who appeared out of nowhere, about many things, including saying about The Rule of Three. Since you have made offerings at three perches, things will probably go smoothly from now on. It is time to return to the ceremonial site and speak to the priest.There is no one at the ceremonial site, You almost feel a bit cheated.Although you could not participate in the ceremony, this is not why you came to Tsurumi Island anyway. Now that you have the Maushiro, it is time to report back.

steps.4: Talk to the mysterious young boy
steps.5: Go to the destination and talk to Ruu
steps.7: Make an offering to the perch
steps.10: Look for the priest

a_strange_story_in_konda.description: A mysterious, masked shrine maiden is by the strange fox statue, seemingly with something she means to ask of you...Search for a secret hidden in Konda Village. The locals may be willing to say a thing or two.The village chief, Densuke, not only refuses to say anything, but also seems eager to show that all is well in Konda village — very suspicious. Find some evidence to break through his defenses.A lot of suspicious evidence has already been collected. It's time to confront Chief Densuke.According to the village chief Densuke, he threw the notebook recording the events back then onto the roof. With any luck, the elements have yet to utterly destroy it.The key to descending the well is within the wrecked house opposite the canal east of the village. You're getting closer to the heart of this mystery.You have obtained the key to descend the well. Since this is Kazari's wish, find out what lies beneath in the greatest depths of Konda Village.This space is much larger than first [sic] meets the eye. It looks like a good place to store some treasure, so you may as well take your time searching.

part_ii.description: After arriving on Seirai island  [sic], you meet two adventurers who are currently investigating something known as a Warding Stone. But following the footprints of a cat, you arrive at a dilapidated shrine, in which sits a cat named Neko, who proclaims itself to be the provisional head priestess of the Asase Shrine. After you help Neko repair the shrine's Offering Box, it reveals the method of sealing the Warding Stones to you. Additionally, you learn that should you be able to seal all four Warding Stones throughout Seirai Island, you can calm the thunderstorm that enshrouds it.

The village to the east requires you to fight a Wooden Shield Mitachurl, an Anemo Samachurl, and a Cryo Abyss Mage. Defeat them to unlock a Precious chest and the Pyro monument.

cleansing_defilement.description: Kazari says that in order to complete the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual, one must break the barrier in 5 places and destroy the defilement incarnate that will then come forth. Besides Konda Village and the abandoned shrine, there are three other places where the barrier surrounds the Thunder Sakura roots: Chinju Forest, Araumi, and below the tidal flats outside the Kamisato Estate. She says that she will await you at the Thunder Sakura root below the well in Konda Village.

Complete the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Rit.1: The locations are in Chinju Forest, Araumi, and Kamisato Estate

part_iii.description: After arriving on Seirai island  [sic], you meet two adventurers who are currently investigating something known as a Warding Stone. But following the footprints of a cat, you arrive at a dilapidated shrine, in which sits a cat named Neko, who proclaims itself to be the provisional head priestess of the Asase Shrine. After you help Neko repair the shrine's Offering Box, it reveals the method of sealing the Warding Stones to you. Additionally, you learn that should you be able to seal all four Warding Stones throughout Seirai Island, you can calm the thunderstorm that enshrouds it.

steps.1: Go to the Warding Stone's location
steps.3: Search for the path to the Warding Stone

Seal the Warding Stone\n.1: Rotate the stone to the correct position (rotate the top 3 times and the bottom 5 times)

divine_plant_of_the_depths.description: Does ancient plant life from the ocean's depths really have the wondrous power to indicate one's destiny?According to Granny Komaki, only water from the shrine's Offering Pool can properly nourish the Spiritherbs.The wishes within the Offering Pool's water will dissipate with time, so get it over to Granny Komaki as soon as possible!Report the situation to Granny Komaki.According to Granny Komaki, Watatsumi Island is home to a cave that plays host to a water source most suited to nourishing the Spiritherbs...Find the most ideal water source with which to nourish Granny Komaki's Spiritherbs.Report the results of your search to Granny Komaki.

Go to Watatsumi Island's shrine\n.1: This is located in the west part of the island at Mouun Shrine

Return to the village in time\n.1: Carry the water back to the shrine at Bourou Village in 120 second(s)

dreams_of_bloom_(quest).description: Something seems to be troubling Sakuya the florist...

dreams_of_sword_art.description: A nameless samurai stands atop the windy sea cliffs, seemingly searching for something...The nameless samurai has asked you to help him find the blade that appears in his memories, but he could only remember a vague location. He tells you of a hut beneath the cliffs on an island in the north, and behind the hut, he says, is a hill...The nameless samurai has asked you to help him find the wine that features in his memories, but he could only remember drinking it with someone else in a military camp. According to the observations you've made along the way, the camp could be located in the east...The samurai seems to be named Masanori. He vaguely remembers seeing a blade on a Tidal Flat in the southwest. That could perhaps be the most critical part of his memory...

Search for the nameless samurai\n.1: Speak with Nameless again to begin the duel

Search for the blade mentioned by the na.1: The sword's location is just west of the Kujou Encampment

Defeat the berserk Masanori\n.2: Masanori will be slightly stronger again and will passively heal 5% of his HP every 4 seconds
Defeat the berserk Masanori\n.3: Additionally when he has less than 10% of his HP, he will enter the Avenger state and will heal to full health.

dredging_the_land.description: The materials that the hilichurls have piled up here have, by pure chance, blocked the flow of the ley lines. If you can destroy these Frostburst Barrels in a short period, you might be able to dredge up the land and obtain more precious Crimson Agates.

These herbs are commonplace in Inazuma's wilds.Inaba Kyuuzou seems to have a matter to entrust to you...It's time to inform Inaba Kyuuzou that the pirate camp he was worried about has been cleared out.Go to the location designated by the final testament.

floating_spirits_\u2014_the_investigatio.description: Recently, more and more adventurers have encountered a floating elemental being. Inazuma City's Katheryne is releasing a series of commissions to minimize needless risks and lay the groundwork for further investigation.

steps.1: Talk to Katheryne in Inazuma City

floating_spirits_\u2014_the_investigatio.description: After a period of investigation, the Adventurers' Guild has eliminated the possible threats that the Specter incident may have caused, and they have also collected a lot of related information. This information has already been handed over to professional researchers, and it seems likely that they will soon make some further progress.

steps.1: Talk to Katheryne in Inazuma City

floral_freefall.description: During the Windblume Festival, the area around Mondstadt will play host to all sorts of interesting activities. The Knights of Favonius' Lizzie would like to introduce you to one of the highlights of this event — Floral Freefall.

fly_high.description: The adventurer Hughes is a wind glider fanatic. To that end, he travels the world, constantly polishing his gliding skills. Recently, he seems to have discovered several prime gliding spots...

from_outer_lands.description: You discovered a strange wrecked ship on a nameless island. But the question is, where did this ship come from?

steps.1: Interact with Slightly Damaged Wooden Plank

gazing_three_thousand_miles_away.description: Chouji, a young lad selling ore on Yashiori Island, seems to be hiding an unfathomable secret...Chouji's treasure has been buried in a rather plain place. The treasure itself won't be too plain, will it?The treasure is very plain indeed! Why, that Chouji...!You can't quite put Chouji, a boy stranded on a lonely, war-torn island, out of your mind. Best to go check in on him again.You need to do a little more mining to get Chouji to open up to you a bit. Perhaps it might not be inappropriate to call this soul-mining.Perhaps being Chouji's guest might be a good idea?It's not clear how you, the guest, wound up making food for the host... but this isn't a huge issue when stacked up against some delicious Imported poultry. Really, it isn't.Your food's in the dock, and Chouji's the judge! How will your dish fare in his eyes?Go talk to Chouji. After all, all troubles can be alleviated through talking to others, no matter how deep... You do believe that, right?Chouji once mentioned that his mother would pray at the shrine. It might be worth a shot to check it out.Tell Chouji about your discovery. Shock his innocent little heart, why don't you?

steps.2: Obtain the treasure mentioned by Chouji
steps.4: Rest until 11:00 – 14:00 the next day and talk to Chouji
steps.8: Learn how to make Imported Poultry

hayashi_of_tanuki_in_the_forest.description: You learn that an old friend of Kazari's can be found in Chinju Forest. Perhaps they might be able to help out with the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual. But while in the forest, you hear a strange shout.The ward of the Chinju Forest is indeed in the hands of bake-danuki Ioroi, and Ioroi is willing to give it up. But he will only do so after you have found and played with the three little bake-danuki: Shousei, Gyoubu Koban, and Kichiboushi...Even though you have obtained the ward from Ioroi, the barrier seems to be hidden by mystical bake-danuki arts. Once you destroy the barrier, you will be one step closer to completing the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual.

steps.1: Search for source of the strange voice

Find the little tanuki (x/3)\n.1: One (Shousei) will appear on the path with gates. After following it, it will turn into a torch. Light the torch to reveal the tanuki.
Find the little tanuki (x/3)\n.2: Another (Kichiboushi) appears as a barrel on a rock next to a group of hilichurls. Paimon will make a comment about the hilichurls.
Find the little tanuki (x/3)\n.3: The last one (Gyoubu Kohan) is sitting on a rock along the forest path. Following it will lead to three torches. Light the middle torch to reveal the tanuki.

steps.6: Head to the location of the barrier

Destroy the barrier\n.1: Adjust the lanterns according to the figure on the gate.

in_the_mountains.description: At the adventurer camp, Iris informs you that there seems to be some bizarrely hard ice blocking the paths into the mountains...The cavern leading up to the summit has been blocked by a mysterious air current that renders it impassible. Head down to the camp in the foothills to ask around. Perhaps someone might have a clue as to your next course of action.The first shard flew up and away after being thawed out... According to Iris, there are two other shards here on Dragonspine. If you follow the strange blue plants, you may be able to find more shards of this sort around the Entombed City Outskirts and Starglow Cavern.Following the mountain path, you discover a Statue of the Seven. Beside it, the path up the mountain extends ever on...You successfully reach Dragonspine's summit from the cavern. However, you see a strange pillar from which those frozen shards seem to have fallen. Those shards also seem to have become frozen once more, requiring you to thaw them out again.After unfreezing the three shards and letting them return to that mysterious pillar, the ice surface beneath the pillar broke, revealing a large space underneath... Perhaps you can return to the adventurers at the camp and report what you've seen here on the summit...

Investigate the strange ice\n.2: Thaw the strange ice. This is done by attacking a Scarlet Quartz, absorbing the crystal and attacking the strange ice with it. This needs to be done four times. The quartz are all near the crystal, although one of them is near said Lawachurl.
Investigate the strange ice\n.3: Activate the orb to unlock the Frostbearing Tree.

octave_of_the_maushiro.description: It has been a while since you last contacted Sumida. She said earlier that she would look for some of the other people who took up her commission and conduct an information exchange. Go back to Inazuma and look for her to see how her attempt proceeds.The other people Sumida commissioned to go to Tsurumi Island all met with more or less similar circumstances. However, you are determined to get to the bottom of this no matter what. If nothing else, you will finish this commission, if it's the last thing you do.Even if the Thunderbird's feathers are the primordial Maushiro, they are probably not what Sumida is looking for. However, according to Ruu, they do possess some special power that may yet be of some use.Though you gained nothing from going to Tsurumi Island's ceremonial grounds earlier, you do obtain a Maushiro thanks to Ruu's help, so as agreed, you head to the ceremonial grounds to have a look. Listen to what the locals have to say and see if there is anything you can help them with.According to the locals, they need someone to help them find Ruu. This trip is starting to feel like a waste of time... But you might as well have a look around the island to see if you can find any other leads. They say that Ruu enjoys hanging around Wakukau Shoal, Oina Beach, and the Autake Plains — First stop, Wakukau Shoal it is, then.You fail to find anything at Wakukau Shoal... Well, mostly, anyway. Your illusory conversation partner has revealed that Ruu may have been here earlier. Regardless, it is time to check out Oina Beach.You fail to find Ruu at Oina Beach, but an illusory Kama greeted you instead. This will be worth remembering, you think, for a future conversation with Kama himself. Now then, off you go to the Autake Plains to see if Ruu can be found there.You see an illusion that seems to resemble Ruu at the Autake Plains. Perhaps this is worth investigating further.This search has proved unfruitful. Time to head back to the ceremonial grounds.It is hard to describe all that has happened here on Tsurumi Island. Still, a Maushiro in hand is a Maushiro in hand. Now all that remains is to return to Inazuma City and submit the goods to Sumida, and your commission shall be complete.

part_iv.description: After arriving on Seirai Island, you meet two adventurers who are currently investigating  something known as a Warding Stone. But following the footprints of a cat, you arrive at a dilapidated shrine, in which sits a cat names Neko, who proclaims itself to be the provisional head priestess of the Asase Shrine. After you help Neko repair the shrine's Offering Box, it reveals the method of sealing the Warding Stones to you. Additionally, you learn that should you be able to seal all four Warding Stones throughout Seirai Island, you can calm the thunderstorm that enshrouds it.

sacrificial_offering.description: According to Kazari, these barriers must be broken to cleanse the Thunder Sakura's roots. The next barrier seems to be located in the abandoned shrine to the northeast of Konda Village. Although the place sounds quite unsetting indeed, this is Kazari's request, so it is best that you see it done.Although you have obtained the ancient and esoteric text, you seem to need the aid of certain sacred words to unseal the Sky Kitsune Statue and obtain the Ward. This is likely to be the realm of the clergy — perhaps you might find some help at the Grand Narukami Shrine.Inagi of the Grand Narukami Shrine told you about the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual, and you also obtained a rather powerful Memento Lens, which can be used to view Earth Kitsune Statues and thus see images of the past. Use this small gadget to find the correct sacred words and obtain the Ward from the Sky Kitsune Statue.

steps.1: Go to the abandoned shrine northeast of Konda Village

Carry out the investigation at the aband.1: Interact with the large Sky Kitsune Statue to the east.

Continue the investigation at the abando.1: Talk to the three Mysterious Shadows twice until they teleport to the three kitsune statues surrounding a small stone platform.
Continue the investigation at the abando.2: The first shadow is in front of a small shrine near the entrance to the area. She will teleport to a kitsune statue along the road.
Continue the investigation at the abando.3: The second shadow is in front of the main shrine with the Electroculus. She will teleport to the Sky Kitsune Statue located southeast of the platform with the three kitsune statues.
Continue the investigation at the abando.4: The third shadow is on the roof of the shrine. She will teleport to the trees south of the main shrine, passing the platform with the three kitsune statues.
Continue the investigation at the abando.5: Once all three shadows are at the platform, they will vanish and spawn 3 Exquisite Chests.
Continue the investigation at the abando.6: Investigate the platform to obtain Sacred Sakura Cleansing Summary.

the_sea_of_fog_and_the_rite_of_the_trees.description: After passing the Maushiro to Sumida, the nature of your commission changes to exploring and investigating Tsurumi Island further. Considering that illusion of Kama you saw, you might need to ask the real one about a few things. With any luck, you might still find him in Ritou.You receive some disturbing information from Kama... This is something that usually only happens in the novels you've read. However, what he describes lines up with the strange things that you have seen happen on Tsurumi Island. In which case, the most important thing to do right now is to go and help Ruu.The conversations you've overhead from the Tsurumi Island natives — well, illusions of them, to be precise — must be the key to breaking through. Since you wish to disrupt their ceremony, then you have to destroy the all-important perches, which are needed for that ceremony.From the reactions of the illusions of the past you see on the island, destroying the perch seems to have had some effect. Well, then. One down, three to go.Now that all the perches on Tsurumi Island have been destroyed, the ceremony can no longer be held. Next up, time to check on the results of your hard work.You witness a scene akin to doomsday occurring at the ceremonial site. This must be the terrifying sight that Ruu has seen many, many times. Left with no choice, you and Paimon flee the scene together.As per your commission, you need to head back to Inazuma City to report to Sumida.

the_sun_wheel_and_mt._kanna.description: Whether you're here to help Ruu or finish the commission, it's time to head to Tsurumi Island once more.Kama's attitude has changed a lot from when you first met him. He expresses the desire to come along and help Ruu. Whatever the case, since he is the descendant of the illusory Kama, perhaps he does have the ability to turn the situation around. Head with him into the terrifying cataclysm and search for Ruu. First stop, Wakukau Shoal!Perhaps it was due to an energy resonance with the Thunderbird feather you obtained on Amakumo Peak or the destruction of the perches that caused the situation to change... But though you failed to find Ruu on Wakukau Shoal, you were able to perceive what might be the Thunderbird memories, which should serve you well in making sense of Tsurumi Island's situation. Time to see if you can find Ruu on Oina Beach.The last place left to search where Ruu said the storm does not touch is Autake Plains. You will be able to find him there for sure this time.Ruu spoke of The Rule of Three: that you must first overcome three difficulties to succeed on your fourth attempt. Now that you have explored Tsurumi Island three times, this fourth excursion should surely end in success. Time to head to Mt. Kanna, where the Thunderbird once dwelt, next.You finally find Ruu and come to some sort of understanding with him.The thing that answered your call was the very same thundering monster that you once defeated on Amakumo Peak. It takes some effort, but you see its challenge off nonetheless. If the circumstances here are similar to what happened before, you should be able to find some of the Thunderbird's memories here as well.It is time to help Ruu fulfill his promise to the ThunderbirdReport back to Sumida and finish your commission.

steps.13: The tumor will fall down again. Destroy the tumor.

a_record_of_all_things.description: Within the ruins, Kliment and Wanyan each betray the contract in turn for personal reasons. As punishment, Kliment is cast out of the ruin and deprived of his reward. Wanyan is made to witness a truth that shatters her beliefs -- the God of Salt was gentle but weak and was betrayed and slain as a result. Bearing witness to this incident and filled with conflicted feelings as a result, you follow Zhongli back to Guyun Stone Forest.

Go to Guyun Stone Forest and talk to Zho.1: Zhongli will be at the highest peak in the forest, which is directly above the Domain of Guyun. The path leading to him will cause the player to run into three Abyss Mages, one each of Pyro, Cryo and Hydro, unless the player climbs their way to the peak.

a_ruin_under_lock_and_key.description: Step 1: The expedition to investigate Osial in the Guyun Stone Forest came away with slim pickings. Kliment and Wanyan also clashed vociferously over their differing perspectives, which has greatly displeased the former.During the argument, he heard Wanyan mention the tale of the God of Salt, and decided to take the party there to try their luck, lest he finishes this venture empty-handed.Step 4: Wanyan mentions that there is an unbreakable seal in Sal Terrae, and that this seal contains that which the God of Salt left behind. You unlock the first contraption with ease, while Zhongli stated that the key to the second puzzle lies within this statement: Tianheng in the south, Yaoguang in the east, Jueyun in the west, Qingce in the north — All desolate and devoid of life. Liyue is vast, yet even one haven is hard to find.

friendships__wishes__and_regrets.description: Meng tells you that Big G is his childhood friend, who died by misadventure. Filled with regret and worry, Meng believes that due to a supernatural turn of events, Big G has become an evil spirit. Luocheng another superstitious person who believes ghost stories just like Meng, visits the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor seeking an exorcism. However, Hu Tao knows that the source of the worries is imaginary, so she comes up with an equally make-believe solution and organizes a fake exorcism. Surprisingly, the spirit of Big G appears before your eyes after the ritual.

Go the ordinary place mentioned by Hu Ta.1: To avoid getting stuck in the infinite staircase room, do not immediately place the blue orb in one of the lamps upon entering the room. Instead, take the blue orb with you and continue on one flight down, swim around, then place the blue orb in the next lamp down. By this point, another blue orb will have spawned where you took the first one from. From then, place the second blue orb in the remaining lamp to open the door.

the_origin_of_the_lanterns.description: On the day of the first full moon each year, the people of Liyue celebrate Lantern Rite. At nighttime, everyone in Liyue releases Xiao Lanterns and the Mingxiao Lantern into the bright night sky. Each Xiao Lantern contains a piece of Plaustrite that makes it float, and people hang wish sticks from them, which carry their hearts' desires in written or painted form. The lanterns slowly fly away, carrying the hope that the light they emit might guide the souls of Liyue's faithful protectors home, that they might return and be reunited with their people once more. You and Paimon arrive in Liyue as the festival is in full swing, preparing to enjoy yourselves...

You decided to begin your investigation with the Anemo Archon of Teyvat's Seven Archons. As such, the first order of the day is to reach the land under the Anemo Archon's protection: Mondstadt.

chapter.Prologue: For a Tomorrow Without Tears

venti_s_plan.description: Stopped at last, Venti explained that he had tried and failed to cleanse Dvalin's curse during their previous meeting. Now, he has been forced to rely on the Holy Lyre der Himmel's power if he is to restore Dvalin.

steps.2: Go to the Cathedral with Venti
steps.4: See how Venti borrows the Holy Lyre

venti_s_new_plan.description: Venti's plan to sweet talk his way into getting the Holy Lyre back backfires. He's come up with a new plan, but seems he'll need your help for it to work.

chapter.Prologue: For a Tomorrow Without Tears

Infiltrate the basement and obtain the H.2: To get through undetected, stay to the left side at all times. You can hide yourself between bookshelves and the center wall. To pass the first guard, you can stand at the pillar on the right until the guard passes then run for the wooden ladder.

wild_escape.description: Venti's plan to steal the Holy Lyre went off without a hitch. Well, almost  when the Lyre was almost in your hands, a stranger stole it from under your noses. Your movements alerted the guards, forcing you to flee the Cathedral.

chapter.Prologue: For a Tomorrow Without Tears

steps.2: Use the wind currents to get far away from the Cathedral
steps.5: Hide on the second floor of the tavern

chapter.Prologue: For a Tomorrow Without Tears

steps.2: Wait till the tavern is closed (00:00 – 06:00)

Greedy Guard: We are goodwill ambassadors from the Snezhno-Mondstadtian Association; (second one is indifferent); How does 500,000 Mora sound? (Note that the Guard will not actually take 500k Mora from the player's Inventory.)
Timid Guard: Give up. No one's going to rescue you; (second one is indifferent); Oh, I already dealt with him already

steps.1: Bring the Holy Lyre back to the tavern

fallen_tears.description: The Holy Lyre is in poor condition, but you manage to restore some of its Anemo power by using Dvalin's tears. To restore its full power, you will need to look for more tears.

chapter.Prologue: Song of the Dragon and Freedom

hurdle.description: You came to Stormterror's Lair to once again attempt Dvalin's rescue. However, it is surrounded by wind barriers made by Stormterror, and the dark forces at work have no intention of letting you break through those barriers so easily.

chapter.Prologue: Song of the Dragon and Freedom

steps.1: Go to the entrance of Stormterror's Lair

empty_abode.description: Assailed by many enemies, you realize that this road will not be an easy one. The way into Stormterror's Lair is strewn with obstacles, and so you must proceed with caution to find a path along the ruined walls.

chapter.Prologue: Song of the Dragon and Freedom

steps.3:
Find a way through the wind barrier.
You can use wind currents to fly over the thorns blocking the path, or burn them with Pyro.
steps.4: You can use wind currents to fly over the thorns blocking the path, or burn them with Pyro.
steps.6:
Look for a way to the top of the tower.
The Exquisite Chest on the edge will be unlocked when you are near and contains the recipe for Northern Smoked Chicken.

steps.8:
Enter the tower.
The Ruin Guard is not an enemy.

light_guiding_ceremony.description: The entrance to Stormterror's Lair is just ahead, but the light seals bar the way in. You must once again face a trial in order to break those seals.

chapter.Prologue: Song of the Dragon and Freedom

Investigate the seal at the top of the t.1: Bring the last part to the light actuator to activate it.
Investigate the seal at the top of the t.2: There is a teleport waypoint that can be unlocked and an Exquisite Chest near the light actuator.

Break the seal in Stormterror's Lair (0/.1: Climb to the top of the tower to glide over the barrier around the tower. This will also get you the Wonders of the World achievement: The Remains of the Gale.
Break the seal in Stormterror's Lair (0/.2: The light actuator to the southwest has three parts. Activating the light actuator will trap you in a barrier with a Pyro Abyss Mage and two Samachurls. You have two minutes to defeat the enemies and break the seal on the light actuator. Collect the parts and bring it to the actuator.
Break the seal in Stormterror's Lair (0/.3:
The light actuator to the northwest is unguarded, so go directly to the pillars of light. (They're all north of the actuator)
One is in a hilichurl camp, but you can skip the battle by breaking the crates and collecting the part quickly.
One is hidden behind a breakable rock wall, but approaching them will spawn a Giant Geo Slime and a Lesser Geo Slime. This battle can be skipped by breaking the wall and collecting the part.
One is inside a wind barrier. Climb the nearby pillars and glide over the barrier to collect the part.
Bring the parts to the light actuator.
Break the seal in Stormterror's Lair (0/.4: One is in a hilichurl camp, but you can skip the battle by breaking the crates and collecting the part quickly.
Break the seal in Stormterror's Lair (0/.5: One is hidden behind a breakable rock wall, but approaching them will spawn a Giant Geo Slime and a Lesser Geo Slime. This battle can be skipped by breaking the wall and collecting the part.
Break the seal in Stormterror's Lair (0/.6: One is inside a wind barrier. Climb the nearby pillars and glide over the barrier to collect the part.
Break the seal in Stormterror's Lair (0/.7: Bring the parts to the light actuator.
Break the seal in Stormterror's Lair (0/.8: The light actuator to the northeast is unguarded, and two of the parts are on top of the pillars. Fly up with nearby wind currents. Bring the parts to the actuator.

The light actuator to the northwest is u.1: One is in a hilichurl camp, but you can skip the battle by breaking the crates and collecting the part quickly.
The light actuator to the northwest is u.2: One is hidden behind a breakable rock wall, but approaching them will spawn a Giant Geo Slime and a Lesser Geo Slime. This battle can be skipped by breaking the wall and collecting the part.
The light actuator to the northwest is u.3: One is inside a wind barrier. Climb the nearby pillars and glide over the barrier to collect the part.
The light actuator to the northwest is u.4: Bring the parts to the light actuator.

calm_before_the_storm.description: The three seals have each been broken by you in their turn. and the path to the decisive showdown is open. You once again return to the lair's entrance to put an end to things.

chapter.Prologue: Song of the Dragon and Freedom

steps.1: Go back to the top of the tower

a_long_shot.description: After a long and daring pursuit of Dvalin, who has been led astray by the Abyss Mages, you are about to finally confront him once and for all.

chapter.Prologue: Song of the Dragon and Freedom

Venture beyond the seal\n.1: Enter the Domain Storming Terror. The battle is split into two parts for the two crystals Dvalin has on his back.

Ride the winds to defeat Dvalin\n.1: The first part is the same air battle from Dragon Storm, with the addition of dodging Dvalin's attacks and flying through rings.
Ride the winds to defeat Dvalin\n.2: You control only the Traveler for this part, regardless of whether the Traveler is part of your active party or not.
Ride the winds to defeat Dvalin\n.3: If you find yourself having a difficult time dodging, eat something that regenerates health over time like Radish Veggie Soup.
Ride the winds to defeat Dvalin\n.4: When Dvalin accelerates out of your attack range, destroy Anemo orbs to create acceleration rings. Fly through the rings to catch up to him.

Defeat Dvalin\n.1: The second part is fighting Dvalin. Venti will be added to your party.
Defeat Dvalin\n.2: You can use Venti or other long-range fighters to attack Dvalin when he's flying.
Defeat Dvalin\n.3: Breaking Dvalin's shield will cause him to collapse on a platform and expose the crystal. You have enough time to climb up his neck and attack it, or enter Aimed Shot Mode with Venti and shoot at the crystal.
Defeat Dvalin\n.4: When the floor is covered with white cracks that constantly deal damage, glide a couple of platforms away until you land on a safe one.

when_the_wind_dies_down.description: You finally managed to save Dvalin. Is this where the story of the wind ends?

chapter.Prologue: Song of the Dragon and Freedom

steps.2:
If you destroy a hilichurl barricade:
Destroy the hilichurls' barricades (0/13)
Talk to Otto

ending_note.description: Amber says that Jean is waiting for you at the Cathedral. Apparently, it's something to do with the Holy Lyre der Himmel...

chapter.Prologue: Song of the Dragon and Freedom

steps.1: Meet Jean and Venti at the Cathedral
steps.2: Give the Holy Lyre der Himmel to Barbara

rite_of_descension.description: In the land of Liyue by the sea, a city sits atop the solid bedrock. That city is Liyue Harbor, and it has flourished under the protection of its guardian Morax — also known as Rex Lapis, the Geo Archon you have been looking for. You could not have arrived at a more fortuitous time, as the annual Rite of Descension has just begun. Every year on this day, Rex Lapis graces this land with his prophecy, giving guidance on the economic path Liyue should follow in the coming year.

Talk to the locals (0/3)\n.1: Talk to Linlang, Guanhai, and Bolai

steps.4: Pray and make a wish at Yujing Terrace (0/2)
steps.5: Join the crowd and wait for the Rite to begin

Escape from the Millelith\n.1: This will involve another Stealth mission where the objective is to avoid being spotted by the NPCs.

steps.8: Talk to Childe at the Northland Bank

an_impromptu_change_of_plan.description: During the rite, the appointed moment arrived. Yet when the clouds parted, a divine carcass crashed down to earth, knocking all the offerings over. Amid the chaos and confusion, the Qixing ordered that the assassin be arrested. Unable to prove your innocence, you were forced to accept the help of Childe of the Fatui, and as suggested by him, you are now headed for Jueyun Karst, a hidden abode where the adepti dwell...

steps.1: Meet the adepti in Jueyun Karst
steps.2: Fight with support from the adepti

wangshu.description: You came across an adeptus, Moon Carver. Seeing the keepsake you bore, he lent you his aid and protected you from the Millelith soldiers pursuing you. Upon learning of Rex Lapis' passing and the unjust accusations laid against you, Moon Carver expressed disdain for the Qixing's actions and began to suspect that they were behind what happened. He has sent you to find several other adepti and deliver a message to them.

steps.2: Ask the boss lady about Xiao
steps.6: Tell Smiley Yanxiao about what happened
steps.9: Find a place where you can see the whole Witness Sigil
steps.10: Chase the ghost

moulder_of_mountains.description: Following the instructions of Moon Carver, you arrive at Mt. Hulao in order to meet with Mountain Shaper.

steps.2: Shatter the amber [big orange rocks, not to be confused with Cor Lapis] on the mountain road to save the trapped person
steps.4: Talk to Li Ding and Li Dang

custodian_of_clouds.description: Following Moon Carver's instructions, you arrive at Mt. Aocang in order to seek out Cloud Retainer.

Search for Cloud Retainer\n.1: Go to the round table in the middle of the lake.

steps.2: Look for traces of food offerings (0/3)

Search for Cloud Retainer\n.1: The story domain for this quest is Cloud Retainer's Abode.

dust_to_dust.description: Having sought out the adepti and completed the task Moon Carver entrusted to you, you return again to Liyue Harbor to look for Childe. He tells you that the Liyue Qixing's response to the archon's passing has given him some food for thought...

steps.1: Return to Liyue Harbor and find Childe

an_organization_known_as_wangsheng.description: Upon your return from visiting the Adepti, you discover that the Qixing have hidden the Geo Archon's vessel away. Childe promised he'd find someone to break the stalemate, so you pay another visit to Northland Bank.

Wait until the following day\n.1: You may use the clock to advance the time.

moonfinger.description: Childe introduced you to Zhongli, a consultant at Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. You agree to help Zhongli organize the Rite of Parting in the hope of seeing the Geo Archon again.

Look for the Meaty tribe's giant cooking.1: This location is in Dadaupa Gorge in Mondstadt, not Liyue.

Use Pyro to heat the pot\n.1: Don't worry about overheating the pot; dialogue will play once the appropriate temperature is reached.

steps.7: Use Pyro to heat the pot again
steps.9: Use Pyro to heat the pot again

Return to Liyue Harbor and find Shitou\n.1: The Noctilucous Jade that was the last to glow is the shiniest.

steps.11: Put the Noctilucous Jade in place

three_poignant_perfumes.description: Zhongli isn't concerned with the deicide itself, but with upholding Liyue's sacred traditions by giving a proper farewell to an archaic lord. Having selected a suitable batch of Noctilucous Jade, your next task is to prepare some perfumes as an offering to the Geo Archon.

Grind the Silk Flowers to extract the es.1: You can use the Crafting Bench for this.

steps.9: Give the Silk Flower Essence to Ying'er
steps.10: Offer the perfumes to the Statue of the Seven

the_realm_within.description: After identifying Rex Lapis' preferred scent, Zhongli sends you to Yujing Terrace to seek out an old friend of his, Madame Ping, and borrow a certain Cleansing Bell. Strange... Zhongli seems to be avoiding his old friend.

Search for the Cleansing Bell\n.1: The story domain for this quest is Inside the Teapot.

steps.4: Put the perfume and Cleansing Bell in place

downtown.description: Who would have guessed - Madame Ping is an adeptus! After leaving her household, which turned out to be a realm within a teapot, you proceed to Chihu Rock to continue preparations.

Find the three workers (0/3)\n.1: Talk to Tic, Tac, and Toe, then barter with them.

guizhong_(archon_quest).description: You came to renowned purveyor of Liyue herbal medicine, Bubu Pharmacy, to procure some Everlasting Incense. But what started out as a straightforward trip to the pharmacy has turned into a far more complicated affair...

steps.2: Find the source of the mystery voice

Retrieve spare parts from the military s.1: You can glide into the window to access the post at the marked location. Inside are multiple Common Chests, and the spare parts are in these chests.

steps.8: Find Qiqi back at the Bubu Pharmacy
steps.9: Put the Everlasting Incense in place

zhongli_s_treat.description: That Bubu Pharmacy trip turned into quite an exhilarating ride. (Okay, maybe not that exhilarating.) In yet another remarkable twist, Zhongli has offered to treat you to dinner!

Wait until the appointed time (18:00-23:.1: You may use the clock to speed up the time

Go to Third-Round Knockout\n.1: It is located across the Teleport Waypoint near the Adventurer's Guild.

the_floating_palace.description: The mysterious emissary Ganyu appeared before you at Third-Round Knockout. Claiming to have come at Ningguang's behest, she invited you to the skyfaring palace known as the Jade Chamber. To that end, you and Paimon have come to Mt. Tianheng, from where you can see the Jade Chamber in the distance.

steps.2: Search for a way up to the Jade Chamber

Try using the mechanism\n.1: The Anemo Pinwheel requires an Anemo character; if your Traveler is set to Geo, you will have to visit a Statue of The Seven in Mondstadt to switch to Anemo.

steps.4: Head over to the Guizhong Ballista

equilibrium.description: After arriving at the Guizhong Ballista on Mt. Tianheng, you are surprised to meet another member of the Qixing there. Her name is Keqing, and she gives you detailed instructions on how to ascend to the Jade Chamber. Paimon, however, is preoccupied with another detail that Keqing mentioned: the custom of bringing a greeting gift.

steps.2: Defeat all enemies. (Obtain Cage Key after defeating the last Treasure Hoarder.)
steps.3: Collect the Extra-Sweet Sweet Flower from the pot near the cage.
steps.5: Kill the Hydro Slime at the southern side of the lake at Duyun Ruins. You will get Tasty Slime Condensate.

solitary_fragrance.description: You finally ascended to the Jade Chamber, where Ningguang was waiting for you. She gracefully accepted Paimon's gift, and offered one in return. You spoke at length about many things, deities, archons... and the Fatui...

heart_of_glaze.description: At Ningguang's advice, you verified the Fatui's schemes regarding the Sigil of Permission before continuing to help Zhongli prepare for the rite. you met Ganyu once again at Dihua Marsh before returning to Liyue Harbor — only to find that things in the city seem to be spiraling out of control.

Go to the Golden House\n.1: The story domain for this quest is The Golden Shadow.

turning_point.description: The adepti faced off against the Qixing outside the city. Just as things were coming to a head, you went to the Golden House to intercept Childe as he attempted to seize the Gnosis, only to find yet another twist: The Gnosis was never at the Golden House to begin with. Childe swiftly switched to his backup plan, attempting to force the Geo Archon to make an appearance by summoning an ancient god with Fatui-forged Sigils of Permission...

Protect the Guizhong Ballista\n.4: This step lasts for 6 minutes and 40 seconds.
Protect the Guizhong Ballista\n.5: Xiao, Ganyu and Madame Ping will provide buffs after Osial's first attack, increasing the player's speed, survivability and applying a powerful burst AoE attack respectively.

the_fond_farewell.description: The ancient god was subdued once again following a fierce battle and much sacrifice. The dust settles, and your journey in Liyue is reaching its conclusion with the Rite of Parting. But before that, there are still some mysteries regarding the Geo Archon that need unraveling.

The way to the islands is blocked by a veil of thunderstorms, so you need to come up with a means of traveling there.You meet with Beidou and she agrees to grant you passage to Inazuma as a reward for winning The Crux Clash. Time to check out the competition.

Best not to let your guard down during the tournament.After witnessing Rongshi's abilities in the semi-finals, you decide that some preparation is in order before the final. After speaking with Beidou and Kazuha, Kazuha invites you to join him elsewhere in Guyun Stone Forest for some additional instruction.

Defeat the Raiden Shogun\n.1: Takes place in the Plane of Euthymia.
Defeat the Raiden Shogun\n.2: This is a scripted fight — after losing about 15-25% of her health, she will enact the Vision Hunt Decree, preventing the use of Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst except for the Traveler's. (This does not prematurely end existing effects from Skills and Bursts. All Normal Attack talents can still be used, including Catalyst users' Normal Attacks, which still deal elemental damage.) About a minute after this, she will begin divine punishment, ending the fight and entering a cutscene.
Defeat the Raiden Shogun\n.3: The player must survive the fight until the Raiden Shogun administers divine punishment; suffering a party wipeout ends the fight normally, and the player will be teleported to outside the Komore Teahouse and must redo Steps 2 and 3.
